sub_title: Manager in sport | interim | realizes succesful sports partnerships & projects | advice EU grants & sport | strategy and implementation | from local to international
summary:
Are you looking for an experienced interim manager in the sport? Do you want to realize a sports partnership or complex project? Do you want to make better use of European opportunities in the field of sport? I like to help sports federations, sports organizations and governments/ municipalities in realizing these ambitions. From local to international. 

EXPERIENCE
For the past 20 years I have come to know the sports world from the inside out. I have experience at NOC*NSF, sports federations, associations, foundations, municipalities, but also internationally. As director, managemer, board member and leader of complex projects and international coalitions with the International Olympic Committee and International Federations and EU projects. 

WHY WORK WITH ME
I would like to help you achieve results within complex playing fields with diverse stakeholders. Co-creation with those involved and connection with the local existing situation is important to me. In doing so, I can switch between strategy and implementation. Because of my broad experience in the sports sector, I easily connect and oversee the sports context. I combine a people-oriented approach with high quality and result-oriented. In addition, you can use my sports content knowledge and extensive network to achieve your goals.

Expertise 
1. Management in sport - Interim management in sport - Project/programme management complex pathways with many stakeholders

2. Cooperation - Achieving sustainable integrated cooperation based on a joint ambition and strategy - Mergers, alliances, networks, cross-sectoral

 3. Europe and sport - EU - Olympic movement - International strategy & development multi-annual programme - Better exploit opportunities of Europe and sport (e.g. advice grants, partners) - Project management international projects 

MISSION "Sport has the power to change the world" - Nelson Mandela 
With WINNING Sport Management & Consultancy I am happy to contribute to this. There's another "world to be won." Together we make a difference. 

MORE INFO 
Do you want to know more, get acquainted or are you interested in working together? I'd love to get in touch with you. M: + 31 6 42 44 10 44 E: ingrid@winningsport.nl W: www.winningsport.nl


E: ingrid@winningsport.nl
M: + 31 6 42 44 10 44

treasury_media.title: Sport- en beweegakkoord voor de gemeente Bergen
treasury_media.description: Het college van Bergen heeft het lokale sport- en beweegakkoord voor de komende twee jaar ondertekend. Het doel van het akkoord is om zoveel mogelijk inwoners aan het sporten en bewegen te krijgen. Sportformateur Ingrid van Gelder heeft met betrokken...

profile_positions.description:
M: + 31 6 42 44 10 44 
E: ingrid@winningsport.nl 
www.winningsport.nl 

Are you looking for an experienced interim manager in the sport? Do you want to realize a sport partnership or complex project? Do you want to make better use of European opportunities in the field of sport? 

I like to help sports federations, sports organizations and governments/ municipalities in realizing these ambitions. From local to international. 

EXPERIENCE
Over the past 15 years I have got to know the sports world from the inside out. I have experience at NOC*NSF (Dutch Olympic Committee* Dutch Sports Confederation), sports federations, foundations, municipalities, but also internationally. 

Director, manager, board member. Leader complex projects and international coalitions with the International Olympic Committee, International Federations, EU projects. 

EXPERTISE 
1. Management in sport 
2. Cooperation 
3. Europe and Sport -Europan Union-EU funding- Olympic Movement
profile_positions.title: Owner | WINNING Sport Management Consultacny | interim & advice | strategic & hands-on

profile_positions.description:
Current roles 
• (Inter)national coordinator YOG Dakar 2022 Legacy program on behalf of NOC*NSF - an innovative collaboration between NOCs, IOC and International Federations, ASOIF, Paris2024. The aim of this coalition is to create a masterplan legacy for the Youth Olympic Games 2022 in Senegal. The first Olympic event on the African continent. 

• Programme coordinator EU project World2Win (Beach) Volleyball on behalf of NOC*NSF- legacy project for the YOG Dakar, cooperation between NOC of the Netherlands and Senegal and Volleyball federations Senegal, France, the Netherlands and Belgium.

www.facebook/world2win  & www.world2win.org


• Sportsformateur Local Sports Agreement Municipality Renswoude

• Advisor & Board Member Foundation Tennis & Padel Promotion Amsterdam

• Proces Manager Prevention Accord Municipality Renswoude

• Advisor Badminton Club Putten

• Proces Manager Sports Federations - Diversity & Inclusion - on behalf of NOC*NSF

• Advisor Strategy Sports Development & Funding Sports Company Kaag & Braassem

• Advisor, Education EU funding  & EU project Management

Former projects:
• Sportsformateur Local Sports Agreement Gemeente Bergen – as an independent process supervisor/project leader realising a well-worn local sports agreement with all local partners.

•Coordination EU application Sportmatch Digital and Physical infrastructur NOC*NSF

• Programme manager #TeamEU on behalf of NOC*NSF- Strategy development and setting up advisory counter for sports federations to make better use of the opportunities of the European Union. Sports federations and NOC*NSF also advise on EU grants and substantive programmes.
profile_positions.title: Projects and roles WINNING Sport Management & Consultancy

profile_positions.description:
• 	Initiator "coalition of the willing" of  National Olympic Committee's, International Olympic Committee, Associaion of Summer Olympic International Federations, International Federation, Youth Olympic Games Dakar 2022 among others. The aim of this coalition is to create a master plan legacy for the Youth Olympic Games 2022 in Senegal and a catalyst for sport development in Africa. This will be the first Olympic event on the African continent. 

• Strategy & organization international partnership program

• Funding – including European Union and Foreign Affairs
profile_positions.title: Manager international programmes

profile_positions.description:
Team Lead for Team Infrastructure & Dual Career and internal, external and (inter)national representation. 
•	Strategic development and management of decentralised (network) organisation 
of 5 Elite Sports and Education Centres (CTOs) and 2 National Elite Sports Centres (NTCs), in total 1000 athletes. Seven Regions where 7 Regional Topsport Organisations facilitate the +/- 150 Regional Training Centres (RTCs).  
•	Knowledge and network building and development of CTOs, NTCs, RTOs, RTC’s in regions.  
•	Strategic stakeholder management: sports federations, ministries, provinces, municipalities, educational parties, regions, regional and national training centres. 
•	Quality improvement by accreditation, visitation model of national and regional training centres.
•	Performance management based on review and monitoring
•	Funding and dividing budget over the elite sport centres ( 6 million direct, 14 million indirect)
•	Strategic Development, policy and implementation Dual Career (all educational levels)


Results: 
•	Creator of the integrated strategic vision for the 2024 Elite Sports Infrastructure & Dual Career called  “Dutch Model 2024”. The key goals being to enhance the athletes’ performance along with social impact for the communities. This approach is a worldwide best practice, developed with and supported by all relevant stakeholders. 
•	Creator and leader of the national complex change project. Restructure the 13 regions into 7 regions and implemented model of regional collaboration (2013-2016). Simultaneously changed the structure and the methods of working. 
•	Creating a dual career network (Primary, Secondary, Senior Secondary Vocational, Higher Professional Education, University level) of practitioners from sports and education, for knowledge sharing, education and development. 
•	Various changes in legislation and regulations, including extra budget for flexible education for athletes through lobby towards governments.
profile_positions.title: Program manager Elite Sports Infrastructure and Dual Career

company.name: Netherlands Canoe Association (Nederlandse Kano Bond / NKB)

profile_positions.location: Huis van de Sport, Nieuwegein Holland
profile_positions.description:
Responsible for successful relaunch of nearly bankrupt federation with a final result of merger between the Netherlands Canoe Association and the Netherlands Water Sports Association (Watersportverbond). 
-	Restructure organisation of the association and improve management, planning and control. 
-	Established the centralisation of the regions including their budgets
profile_positions.title: Interim Director Netherlands Canoe Association (NKB)

profile_positions.description:
Strategy, implementation and funding of Masterplan Talent Development “Talent Central”.  Lead team of 
Project managers. Results: certification of talent programmes federations, talent provisions, talent coaches, 
talent services, regional talent development, Leo van der Kars Fund.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager NOC*NSF Elite Sports- Specialization Talent Development

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for collective elite sports policy, for sports associations and the NOC*NSF, called the 2008-2012 Sports Agenda. 
Result:  a new financing methodology and elite sports distribution model for sports
associations
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager NOC*NSF Elite Sports Policy

profile_positions.description:
Project management, interim assignments, policy recommendations, grant applications for over 30 different larger and smaller sports associations, incl.: 
- Interim policy officer Motor sport
- Interim head department coach education programmes Volleyball
- Sports promotion initiatives in schools for ice hockey and skating associations
- Strategic Marketing Plan for various sports, incl. Rugby, Darts, Aviation
- Healthy Sports Association KNLTB
- Development and presentation of introduction modules for new employees Sports Federations
profile_positions.title: Consultant NOC*NSF Sport Assist

profile_positions.description:
Worked in various roles, incl.:
- Districts department, Osdorp district
- Sports promotion department, Social Development Service
- Public administration division
- G-4 Office in Brussels Belgium via Economic Affairs Service.
profile_positions.title: Management Traineeship Municipality of Amsterdam

volunteer_experiences.description:
Toen ik actief werd voor het Jeugdfonds waren er nog twee aparte fondsen voor Sport & Cultuur. Ik was zowel bestuurslid Jeugdfonds Sport en bestuurslid Jeugd Cultuurfonds in Almere. Als bestuurder was ik verantwoordelijk voor de bestuurlijke en operationele fusie / samensmelting tot Jeugdfonds Sport en Cultuur. 

Momenteel ben ik Voorzitter van het Jeugdfonds Sport & Cultuur Almere. De samenwerking en verbinding tussen sport & cultuur is een heel natuurlijke. Het Jeugdfonds in Almere vergoedt lidmaatschappen voor verenigingen voor sport en cultuur jaarlijks 2500 kinderen van minimagezinnen. 

Binnen het bestuur heb ik meerdere rollen vervuld, van vice-voorzitter, penningmeester, algemeen bestuurslid tot voorzitter.

volunteer_experiences.role: Vrijwilliger diverse commissies en bestuur tennisverenigingen De Vliegende Hollander en Tiebreakers
volunteer_experiences.description: Veel van mijn vrijwilligersactiviteiten op verenigingsniveau zijn gericht op jeugd. Coachen van Jeugdraad, opzetten en leiden landelijke jeugd- en open toernooien, jeugdcommissie en bestuur, jeugdbeleid. De jeugd heeft de toekomst, daar zet ik me dan ook graag voor in.
